name: Heel to Butt
steps: Stand up straight with your feet hip-width apart.
Bend your right knee and bring your right heel towards your buttock.
Grasp your right ankle with your right hand and hold it in place.
Hold the stretch for 10-15 seconds or until you feel a stretch in your quadriceps muscle.
Release the stretch and repeat with your left leg.
Alternate between your left and right legs for the desired number of repetitions.

ailing.lower back pain: use caution and modify as needed
